string.name: banner_serenity_description
string.value: Gentle and soothing melodies to guide you into a relaxed state of mind.

string.name: banner_electronic_description
string.value: Upbeat and energetic electronic music to ignite every moment.

string.name: banner_sleep_description
string.value: Soft melodies to accompany you into a deep sleep.

string.name: banner_nature_description
string.value: Feel the breath of nature and listen to the whispers of the world.

string.name: banner_winter_description
string.value: Warm winter melodies that bring comfort and solace during the cold season.
